text: Payment Guaranteed is a 1921 American silent drama film directed by George L. Cox and starring Margarita Fischer, Cecil Van Auker, and Hayward Mack.St. Romain p.110 ==Cast== * Margarita Fischer as Emily Heath * Cecil Van Auker as Stephen Strange * Hayward Mack as Harry Fenton * Harry Lonsdale as Jim Barton * Harvey Clark as Reporter * Marjorie Manners as Myrtle * Alice Wilson as Gertie ==References== ==Bibliography== * St. Romain, Theresa. Margarita Fischer: A Biography of the Silent Film Star. McFarland, 2008. ==External links== * Category:1921 films Category:1921 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by George L. Cox Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Payment Guaranteed
